title: Apple ginger chutney
ingredients: ['1kg apples - peeled, cored and finely chopped', '50g fresh root ginger, peeled and grated', '250ml malt vinegar or cider vinegar', '200g granulated sugar', '100g dark brown soft sugar', '2 teaspoons mixed spice', '1 teaspoon dried ground ginger', '1 pinch salt']
